I feel like the installation instructions are a bit vague. When you copy/paste the folders in the main folder... Do you mean copy/paste the actual folders? Or do you mean the content inside the folders should be copy pasted? (ie. Binaries and BMGame folder). When I run BatmanAC.exe it loads and nothing happens...
AND. If I am copy pasted specifically the Binaries and BMGame, do I copy and replace each time?

@kersedsaint1

You must be new to this(that's not an insult). Yes, you copy the folders within the main torrent folders, ie., the Binaries BMGame, etc and overwrite everything so you replace the older files with the newer/updated ones.

Also, use this torrent for the DLC's that Narator posted above: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7404287/BAC_DLC_Pack_v3 instead of the DLC file in this torrent(it's updated).

Lastly, don't forget step 5: Edit "PCGame" file and add +DLCBundlesInstalled="Iceberg" (save) ...it's important. Hope you get it working. :)
